Articles.Content:
@TML Welcome back. I just did the mission and you show up... anyhow, I'm glad that you play the mission.

Looking forward for your video.

@TML Welcome back. I just did the mission and you show up... anyhow, I'm glad that you play the mission.

Looking forward for your video.

Sorry to grab it from you like that.

And I know it's my own darned fault.

Just like the last time that made me storm off in a huff.

But you did say I was welcome...

The video is up, BTW.

On another note, I would like my score re-tabulated. I noted an error in my scoring of mission #004.......


mission 004:  90
mission 009: 119
mission 016: 126

mean:  112
total: 335

...and, you've misspelled my name.

Edited October 11, 2013 by ThreeMartiniLaunch

Nice job, and sorry about the typo. Could you clarify what the discrepancy is on the score for mission #4? The only ones I didn't give you were "complete under 6hrs", "plant a flag", and "deploy an asset", aside from the bonus points.
I was busy designing the BSC-Heavy Lander Challenge. Almost done.
I have a house guest for the weekend. You probably won't hear from me until next week.

I HAVE THE FILE!!!

oooh shiny...
@JonSpace_CEO Good luck! The clock is ticking.

Ack! I left a MechJeb on the escape pod design in the subassembly folder. I hope this does not cause a problem.

There are no unauthorized parts on ships actually in flight.

TML

okay, problem

I thought i could do the mission in the time remaining before i had to go to sleep, didn't realize there are actually 2 things that need deorbiting (and so now have to go without the mission being finished)

Can i have an extension or something or is this a mission failure (would prefer the former)

PS i also built a ship with procedural fairings on it, but i have replicated it (without the fairings) and named them accordingly (XXX and XXX w/profairings).

EDIT: i really have to go now so i guess i'll check back in the morning

The mission I offered was only for the one that I kicked away.

Also, keep in mind, you don't actually have to do the mission. You can do whatever you want. That's why I don't mind issuing simple missions.

Per the rules, anyone can claim the file if you have not posted results in six hours.

TML

Nice job, and sorry about the typo. Could you clarify what the discrepancy is on the score for mission #4? The only ones I didn't give you were "complete under 6hrs", "plant a flag", and "deploy an asset", aside from the bonus points.

I didn't count double points for video vs. images.
Yea...as I said, mission must be written in detail, as detail as possible. People intent to think more complex way of doing things.
Ok, I'm boring. I have the file...

Mission #016 Complete!

[a cool mission picture]

[Mission synopsis]

Since the replacement is in place, the faulty escape pod(s) is deorbit to Minmus surface, and destroy.

[Additional pictures/album]

Javascript is disabled. View full album

[MakeSureThat]

I've uploaded the save file to the Official shared folder, Upload your finished archive to the folder

Points claimed:


10 - Completed within six hours. [COLOR="#0000FF"]Yes[/COLOR]
10 - Plant at least one unique flag. Nope
10 - Complete the previous objective. [COLOR="#0000FF"]Yes[/COLOR]
10 - Posting a new objective. [COLOR="#0000FF"]Yes[/COLOR]
15 - Posting a couple pictures or a video of your mission (double points for videos). [COLOR="#0000FF"]Yes[/COLOR]
15 - Deploying an asset into orbit (scanner/miner/station/tug/etc.). Nope
30 - Following all five rules. [COLOR="#0000FF"]Yes[/COLOR]
Time bonus: [COLOR="#0000CD"]15 if complete under an hour[/COLOR], 10 if completed between one and two hours, 05 if completed between two and four hours.
Team bonus: 01 per mission between your last one and this one. (up to 10 points)[COLOR="#0000FF"] [/COLOR]

OP please add up the point for me.

Previous mission objective: De-orbit the faulty escape pod(s) to Minmus surface, and destroy them.

New mission objective: By using the sub-assembly loader.

Load the "fuel depot core", build a lifter rocket (Or using the sub-assembly 43T lifter),

and delivery the "fuel depot core" to dock with the "Near Point Station" (which can be found orbiting the Mun).

(Please make sure the struct on "fuel depot core" are properly connected.).

Alternately you may use the below pre-build craft file for the mission.

http://www./download/44jrfj7o4xrhcyu/Fuel_Station_Core.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited October 13, 2013 by Sirine
typo

Sirine, could you check your pictures for mission 17? They aren't all showing up for some reason.

TML, you were awarded the double points for video, as seen in columns G, and H in the spreadsheet.

Also, be aware that I've increased the team bonus from 01/mission to 02/mission but kept the 10point maximum: this means you only need to wait 5 missions to get the full bonus. This has not changed the rankings, but should hopefully prevent stagnation of the missions.

You know what.. I play the mission in under 1 hours...uploading to imgur take about 3 hours....until now, still uploading...only 49 images....Imgur keep skipping my image between a few screen....damn..need to upload again and again...and here my internet line are damn so ....slow.

Finally done...adding description to images.

Edited October 12, 2013 by Sirine
Hi guys, I want to do a manned landing mission to duna and ike which will be fully reusable but I don't know how to get the file, does someone know how to get it ?

I have the file

Again...

Hope you finish it with no problem.

Here are expected mission finish on how it looks like.

Mission 17 Complete!

The docking array is now on the nearpoint station!

YouTube link to mission video (link because I'm not entirely sure how to embed these things):

I've uploaded the save file to the Official shared folder, Upload your finished archive to the folder(only the actual save file, tell me if you also need the GameData and PluginData folders)

Points claimed: On-Time, Complete Objective, New Objective, Video, Asset?, Rules

Time to complete: between 1 and 2 hours.

New mission objective: Somehow de-orbit the booster stage at the mun and/or do house keeping (rotate crew, refill station fuel tanks etc.)

Edited October 14, 2013 by JonSpace_CEO
Tell me if i missed anything in the mission accomplished post (apart from the video)

Tell me if i missed anything in the mission accomplished post (apart from the video)

Congratulation, on the mission success! Apart from the video, everything seems fine. Looking forward for your next mission!

ok. here is the problem. Below pop up, when I try to download the save file from mediafire...

File Blocked for Violation.

The file you requested has been blocked for a violation of our Terms of Service.

Still have questions, or think we've made a mistake? Please contact support for further assistance.

Edited October 13, 2013 by Sirine
I wonder will this be too hard for others? Docking all Mun assets to the Mun station.
The save file appears to be OK now, but I'm not sure what caused that issue for you. Please note that the previous mission was #018.
Hello everyone, I have the file.
